I’ll be at SEPLN 2019 in Bilbao and NoDaLiDa 2019 in Turku, presenting joint work with Lilja Øvrelid and Erik Velldal on multi-task learning for sentiment, as well as my former Master’s student Àlex R. Atrio, who will be presenting our work on the effect of word order on cross-lingual sentiment models. If you’re around, feel free to get in contact!
